page.auth.signup.title: Signup
page.cform.begin.guest.hint1: We are letting you post a classified as a guest. So we have to review your post before it gets published which can take upto 24 hours.
page.cform.begin.guest.hint2: You can avoid this delay, if you simply signup with us!
page.cform.begin.hint1: Fields marked with a '*' are compulsory and must be filled.
page.cform.begin.hint2: This classified will be published immediately and can be archived by accessing your account page.
page.cform.begin.title: Post now. new classified. Wow!
page.cform.details.category.label: Category *
page.cform.details.email.label: Email
page.cform.details.hint1: Here you'll mention things like the price, location, category of your classified.
page.cform.details.hint2: This will help make your classified more visible and easily searchable.
page.cform.details.location.label: Location
page.cform.details.phone.label: Phone
page.cform.details.title: Such details
page.cform.details.type.label: Type *
page.cform.details.type.select: What kind of classified is this?
page.cform.edit.guest.hint1: Since you are editing this classified as a guest, we will have to review your changes before the classified goes live again
page.cform.edit.hint2: All changes to this classified will be effective immediately.
page.cform.edit.title: You are about to edit a classified
page.cform.images.hint1: Get at least twice the number of views by uploading images.
page.cform.images.hint2: Upload upto 10 images with each image having a maximum size of 10 MB.
page.cform.images.hint3: Add your images here, by dragging and dropping them into the box below or by clicking on it.
page.cform.images.hint4: Professionaly taken images get promoted by our moderators and have a better chance to be placed on the homepage.
page.cform.images.hint5: Selected images get displayed above. If you want to remove an image, simply click/tap on it.
page.cform.images.title: Give Images. Very beautiq!
page.cform.info.hint1: Here you give the title and the content for your classified. Describe your classified giving as much detail as you can.
page.cform.info.hint2: You can mention other details like the price, location, contact info in the next section.
page.cform.info.label.title: Title *
page.cform.info.placeholder.title: The title for your classified goes here
page.cform.info.title: Wow, so much content
page.cform.submit.hint1: Your classified is now ready to be uploaded as soon as you click on the button below.
page.cform.submit.hint2: Disclaimer: By submitting this classified, you are agreeing to our privacy and terms of use.
page.cform.submit.title: Much work. Very finish!
page.cmanage.noclassifieds: You haven't published any classifieds yet
page.contact.hint1: Want to send us a message? Have an awesome idea? Found a bug? Or want to file a complaint?
page.contact.hint2: Leave us a message below and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible
page.contact.title: Contact Us
page.csingle.disclaimer: By viewing this classified, you are agreeing to our privacy conditions and terms of use. This site is never involved in any transaction, and does not handle payments, shipping, guarantee transactions, provide escrow services, or offer 'buyer protection' or'seller certification' for any classified. It is your duty to ensure safety and authenticity while dealing with any buyer/sellers.
page.gfinish.congrat: Congratulations! Your classified has been submitted
page.gfinish.instr: To edit, archive or repost your classified at any time, use this link.
page.gfinish.since: Since we can't verify your identity, We will have to review your classified before publishing it.
page.gfinish.warn: Warning: Do not share this link with anyone else. If you lose this link, you cannot delete this classified.
